targets.query:
from(bucket: "bssr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_4" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_3" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_4" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_3" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_3_cell_4" or r["_field"] == "module_3_cell_3" or r["_field"] == "module_3_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_3_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_3_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_4" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_3" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_4" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_3" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/1/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/1/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/1/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/1/cell/3" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/1/cell/4" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/2/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/2/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/2/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/2/cell/3" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/2/cell/4" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/3/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/3/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/3/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/3/cell/3" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/3/cell/4" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/4/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/4/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/4/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/4/cell/3" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/4/cell/4" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/5/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/5/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/5/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/5/cell/3" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/voltage/module/5/cell/4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bssr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BBMB" or r["_field"] == "MCMB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "bus_metrics/current/MCMB" or r["topic"] == "bus_metrics/current/BBMB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bssr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BBMB" or r["_field"] == "MCMB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "bus_metrics/voltage/MCMB" or r["topic"] == "bus_metrics/voltage/BBMB" or r["topic"] == "bus_metrics/current/MCMB" or r["topic"] == "bus_metrics/current/BBMB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bssr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "module_0_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_5_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_4_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_3_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_2_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_1" or r["_field"] == "module_0_cell_2" or r["_field"] == "module_1_cell_0" or r["_field"] == "module_0_cell_1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/0/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/0/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/0/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/1/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/1/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/2/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/1/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/2/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/3/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/2/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/4/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/4/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/4/cell/2" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/5/cell/0" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/5/cell/1" or r["topic"] == "cell_metrics/temperature/module/5/cell/2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "bssr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "wind_sensor/speed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
